title: The life, death and actions of the most chast, learned, and religious lady, the Lady Iane Gray, daughter to the Duke of Suffolke Containing foure principall discourses written with her owne hands. The first an admonition to such as are weake in faith: the second a catechisme: the third an exhortation to her sister: and the last her words at her death.
author: Grey, Jane, Lady, 1537-1554.
publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Iohn wright: and are to be sold at his shop without Newgate, at the signe of the Bible,
